中国远古时代特色单位。替代斥候。与其他单位编组时，其他单位的移动力会增加到同等水平。
中国工业时代特色单位。替代侦察兵。劫掠消耗的 [ICON_Movement] 移动力减少2点。
中国远古时代特色单位。替代勇士。可进行农田建造或地貌清除（仅一次）。
中国古典时代特色单位。替代剑客。 [ICON_Movement] 移动力允许的情况下可一回合攻击二次。
中国文艺复兴时期特色单位。替代火枪手。获得经验增加50%。
中国现代特色单位。替代步兵。击败蛮族以外敌方单位时有几率将其转化为游击队。
中国信息时代特色单位。替代机械化步兵。受伤后 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力不会降低。
中国远古时代特色单位。替代矛兵。身处城区或要塞中时+10 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。
中国中世纪特色单位。替代长枪兵。对抗骑兵单位时+17 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力（不包含反骑兵加成）。
中国现代特色单位。替代反坦克兵。击败蛮族以外敌方单位时有几率将其转化为游击队。
中国信息时代特色单位。替代现代反坦克兵。受伤后 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力不会降低。
中国古典时代特色单位。替代骑手。对抗近战单位时+10 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。
中国工业时代特色单位。替代近代骑兵。在敌对领土内开始回合+2 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。
中国原子能时代特色单位。替代直升机。受伤后 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力不会降低。
中国远古时代特色单位。替代战车。为占据相同地形的相邻单位提供双倍支援 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。
中国中世纪特色单位。替代骑士。邻接大将军时+5 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力，消灭敌人时+5大将军点数。
中国现代时代特色单位。替代坦克。初始获得一个免费晋升。
中国信息时代特色单位。替代现代装甲。受伤后 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力不会降低。
中国远古时代特色单位。替代投石兵。承受近战攻击时战斗力增加10。
中国远古时代特色单位。替代弓箭手。消灭敌方军事单位时获得等同于其50%战斗力的 [ICON_Culture] 文化。
中国中世纪特色单位。替代弩手。邻接或处于本国领土时，+1 [ICON_Range] 射程
中国工业时代特色单位。替代野战炮。临近友方【定位侦测】单位时+1 [ICON_Range] 射程
中国原子能时代特色单位。替代机枪兵。受伤后 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力不会降低。
中国古典时代特色单位。替代投石车。移动力允许的情况下可一回合攻击二次。
中国文艺复兴时期特色单位。替代臼炮。对抗身处城区的单位或城区本身时战斗力增加7。
中国现代时代特色单位。替代炮兵。受伤后 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力不会降低。
中国信息时代特色单位。替代火箭炮。在一回合以内可同时移动或攻击。

Chinese unique Ancient era unit that replaces the Scout.Formation units all inherit escort's [ICON_Movement] Movement speed.
Chinese unique Industrial era unit that replaces the Scout.Pillaging costs only 1 [ICON_Movement] Movement point.
Chinese unique Ancient era unit that replaces the Warrior.Can build a Farm (Only once).
Chinese unique Classical era unit that replaces the Swordsman.+1 additional attack per turn if [ICON_Movement] Movement allows.
Chinese unique Renaissance era unit that replaces the Musketman.Gains +50% experience.
Chinese unique Modern era unit that replaces the Infantry.May capture defeated enemies, turning them into Guerrilla for China.
Chinese unique Information era unit that replaces the Mechanized Infantry.Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.
Chinese unique Ancient era unit that replaces the Spearman.+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when occupying a district or Fort.
Chinese unique Medieval era unit that replaces the Pikeman.+17 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. cavalry units.
Chinese unique Modern era unit that replaces the AT Crew.May capture defeated enemies, turning them into Guerrilla for China.
Chinese unique Information era unit that replaces the Modern AT.Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.
Chinese unique Classical era unit that replaces the Horseman.+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. melee units.
Chinese unique Industrial era unit that replaces the Cavalry.+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement if this unit starts in enemy territory.
Chinese unique Atomic era unit that replaces the Helicopter.Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.
Chinese unique Ancient era unit that replaces the Heavy Chariot.Double Support bonus.
Chinese unique Medieval era unit that replaces the Knight.Additional +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when adjacent to a Great General. +5 Great General points when killing an enemy unit.
Chinese unique Modern era unit that replaces the Tank.Starts with 1 free Promotion.
Chinese unique Information era unit that replaces the Modren Armor.Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.
Chinese unique Ancient era unit that replaces the Slinger. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending vs. melee class units.
Chinese unique Ancient era unit that replaces the Archer.50% [ICON_Culture] Culture is earned from kills.
Chinese unique Medieval era unit that replaces the Crossbowman. +1 [ICON_Range] Range when fighting in or adjacent to its home territory.
Chinese unique Industrial era unit that replaces the Field Cannon.+1 [ICON_Range] Range when adjacent to a Observe Unit.
Chinese unique Atomic era unit that replaces the Machine Gun. Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.
Chinese unique Classical era unit that replaces the Catapult.+1 additional attack per turn if [ICON_Movement] Movement allows.
Chinese unique Renaissance era unit that replaces the Bombard. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength vs. units in districts.
Chinese unique Modern era unit that replaces the Artillery. Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged.
Chinese unique Information era unit that replaces the Rocket Artillery. Can move and shoot in the same turn.
